model_answer: The correct chronological order of events is: (2) On a TED stage with “(re)negotiating” behind him, the speaker says tools of creativity became tools of speech. (3) Applause follows the introduction of Edward Snowden during a discussion of surveillance. (4) A laptop displays the Wikipedia logo while the speaker discusses open access/net neutrality. (5) A New Hampshire map marks Dixville Notch and Nashua as the speaker recounts a January 11–24 memorial walk joined by 200 people. (1) A snowy scene shows the on-screen text "96%" while a poll about money in politics is cited. Therefore, the answer is A: 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 1.
